thread.title: The BuzzFeed News App Has Been Downloaded More Than 350,000 Times
thread.title_full: The BuzzFeed News App Has Been Downloaded More Than 350,000 Times

title: The BuzzFeed News App Has Been Downloaded More Than 350,000 Times
text:
Print Page by: Benjamin Mullin | Poynter 
Earlier this year, BuzzFeed launched its much-anticipated news app after a tinkering and testing period that stretched for about half a year. 

A lot was riding on the debut. In the months leading up to the launch, BuzzFeed built a team with a handful of journalists devoted to selecting and creating the journalism that populates the app.
